prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon that has a fluffy tail and bright yellow fur.
I want a Pokemon with large ears and a cheerful personality that loves to play.
Generate a cute electric Pokemon with a round body and a playful demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that has a lightning bolt-shaped tail and a friendly expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a vibrant yellow color.
Design a playful creature with long ears and an affinity for electric attacks.
Show me a Pokemon with a small stature, round shape, and a mischievous look.
